name: Dialogic Indexed Voice Audio File
summary: Learn about .VAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VAP files are used for storing multiple voice recordings in a single file and navigating them in software or hardware.

description: Voice recording file created in Dialogic's VAP file format; contains an indexed, or annotated, collection of .VOX or .WAV files, which use ADPCM (Adaptive Differential Pulse Code Modulation) encoding and specific sampling frequencies.
